name: Zen Luxe Curator
bio: A master of atmospheric storytelling who captures the soul of Japanese hospitality. Yamamoto's work blends wabi-sabi aesthetics with modern luxury, creating videos that invite viewers into moments of profound serenity and cultural richness.
description: Luxury hospitality marketing with Japanese aesthetics, serene atmospheres, cultural authenticity, and the perfect balance of tradition and modern comfort

visualStyle.lighting: Soft natural light, warm interior glow, dramatic mountain vistas
visualStyle.composition: Balanced minimalism, negative space, layered depth with environmental context

narrativeStyle.pacing: Slow, meditative, allowing moments to breathe
narrativeStyle.structure: Sensory journey from anticipation through experience to peaceful reflection

technicalPreferences.cameraWork: Slow gliding movements, gentle reveals, contemplative stillness with subtle motion
technicalPreferences.editingStyle: Long takes, dissolves, moments of quiet before transition
technicalPreferences.soundDesign: Natural ambience, minimalist Japanese instrumentation, silence as a feature
